title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Greece 2024
yAxis: GDP growth rate compared to previous year
summary: The statistic depicts Greece 's real Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate from 2014 to 2018 , with projections up until 2024 .
GDP refers to the total market value of all goods and services that are produced within a country per Year .
It is an important indicator of the economic strength of a country .
gold: The statistic depicts Greece 's gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate from 2014 to 2018 , with projections up until 2024.
